UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Development of Antimicrobial Peptide-Antibiotic Conjugates to Improve the Outer Membrane Permeability of Antibiotics Against Gram-Negative Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Yamauchi R, Kawano K, Yamaoka Y, Taniguchi A, Yano Y, Takasu K, Matsuzaki K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:15% Cytotoxicity=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=20µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=40µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=>80µM)
